issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Between the time a new port is picked up to start HMS or HS2, and the time when HMS or HS2 is started, the port can get used by some other service resulting in test failure.
fields.summary: Tests can fail with java.net.BindException: Address already in use

comments.body: If HMS or HS2 is not started with the picked port number, it will be retried with a new port number for 10 times.
